description.russian: Спасти товарища, на которого бросился ксеноморф
description.spanish: Rescata a un compañero de un cuerpo a cuerpo

displayName.english: Thank You, That Will Be All

description.english: Complete Stasis Interrupted on any difficulty
description.french: Termine Stase Interrompue avec n'importe quelle difficulté
description.german: Schließen Sie Stase Unterbrochen mit beliebiger Schwierigkeit ab
description.italian: Completa Stasi Interrotta in qualsiasi livello di difficoltà
description.polish: Ukończ kampanię Przerwana Hibernacja na dowolnym poziomie trudności
description.russian: Завершить кампанию ''Прерванный Стазис'' на любом уровне сложности
description.spanish: Completa Hipersueño Interrumpido con cualquier dificultad

description.english: Complete Stasis Interrupted on Ultimate Badass
description.french: Termine Stase Interrompue en difficulté Méga gros dur
description.german: Schließen Sie Stase Unterbrochen mit Ultimate Badass ab
description.italian: Completa Stasi Interrotta in difficoltà Infernale
description.polish: Ukończ kampanię Przerwana Hibernacja na poziomie trudności Twardziel absolutny
description.russian: Завершить кампанию ''Прерванный Стазис'' на уровне сложности ''Супергерой''
description.spanish: Completa Hipersueño Interrumpido en nivel Supercabronazo

description.english: Find All Stasis Interrupted Audio Logs
description.french: Trouve tous les journaux audio dans Stase Interrompue
description.german: Finden Sie alle Audio-Logs in Stase Unterbrochen
description.italian: Trova tutti i diari audio in Stasi Interrotta
description.polish: Odnajdź wszystkie nagrania w kampanii Przerwana Hibernacja
description.russian: Найти все аудиозаписи в кампании ''Прерванный Стазис''
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las grabaciones de voz de Hipersueño Interrumpido

displayName.english: I Only Need To Know One Thing
displayName.french: Je veux juste savoir un truc
displayName.spanish: Yo solo necesito saber una cosa

description.english: Find your family
description.french: Trouve ta famille
description.german: Finden Sie Ihre Familie
description.italian: Trova la tua famiglia
description.spanish: Encuentra a tu familia

displayName.spanish: Que lo carguen a mi cuenta

description.english: Destroy the Legato
description.french: Détruis le Legato
description.german: Zerstören Sie die Legato
description.italian: Distruggi la Legato
description.spanish: Destruye la Legato

displayName.german: Ich hab nicht den ganzen Tag

description.english: Sever the umbilical without missing a shot
description.french: Coupe le cordon ombilical sans manquer un tir
description.german: Trennen Sie die Gangway, ohne zu verfehlen
description.italian: Recidi il corridoio senza mancare un colpo
description.polish: Zerwij śluzę nie pudłując ani razu
description.russian: Перебить соединитель, ни разу не промахнувшись
description.spanish: Destruye el corredor sin fallar ni un disparo

displayName.english: They're Dead, OK? Can We Go Now?
displayName.french: Ils sont morts ! Bon, on y va ?
displayName.german: Die sind tot. War's das jetzt?

description.english: Kill all the Lurkers in Sulaco engineering
description.french: Tue tous les Rôdeurs dans l'ingénierie du Sulaco
description.german: Töten Sie alle Lauerer im Maschinenraum der Sulaco
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i Lurker nel reparto Ingegneria della Sulaco
description.polish: Wybij wszystkich kseno-łowców w sekcji inżynieryjnej Sulaco
description.russian: Убить всех люркеров в инженерном отсеке ''Сулако''
description.spanish: Mata a todos los acechadores en la sala de ingeniería de la Sulaco

displayName.english: Now What Are We Supposed To Do?
displayName.french: Et on est censé faire quoi, là ?

description.english: Escape the FTL ship
description.french: Echappe-toi du vaisseau hypersonique
description.german: Fliehen Sie vom ÜLG-Schiff
description.italian: Scappa dalla nave FTL
description.spanish: Escapa de la nave supralumínica

description.english: Survive the Queen escape
description.french: Survis à l’échappée de la Reine
description.german: Überlebe den Ausbruch der Königin
description.italian: Sopravvivi alla fuga dalla Regina
description.spanish: Sobrevive a la huida de la Reina

displayName.english: It's The Only Way To Be Sure
displayName.french: C'est le seul moyen d'être sûr
displayName.german: Nur so kann man sicher sein
displayName.polish: To jedyny sposób by mieć pewność

description.english: Destroy all samples in the labs of the Queen module
description.french: Détruis tous les échantillons dans le labo du module de la Reine
description.german: Zerstören Sie alle Proben im Labor des Moduls der Königin
description.italian: Distruggi tutti gli esemplari del modulo della Regina nel laboratorio
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkie próbki w laboratorium modułu królowej
description.russian: Уничтожить все образцы в лабораториях модуля королевы
description.spanish: Destruye todos los ejemplares de los laboratorios del módulo de la reina
